channel.title: printmaking on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in printmaking on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Reduction Printing Explained Visually
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with taking notes and explaining things to myself visually using Paper.

item.title: Color Woodcut Printmaking: Day 4 & 5
item.description: The last two days of the workshop were work days.

item.title: Color Woodcut Printmaking: Day 3
item.description: Today I finished my first reduction woodcut.

item.title: Color Woodcut Printmaking: Day 2
item.description: I’m blogging about my experience taking Karen Kunc’s “Color Woodcut Printmaking” class at Constellation Studios.

item.title: Color Woodcut Printmaking: Day 1
item.description: A friend suggested I take notes and write them up after each day of class to make sure things stick.

item.title: Torino
item.description: I printed my last practice print yesterday before heading to Lincoln.

item.title: Tower
item.description: I was in the studio last week, printing a new piece, the Tower Theater.

item.title: Draft Work: “Fast Pass”
item.description: Fast Pass: 3" x 5" two plate linocut print Last week when I was printing my line study, I had a couple extra hours in the studio.

item.title: Coffee Cup line study
item.description: Untitled (coffee cup line study): 4" x 5" linocut print I wanted to practice using lines to describe, rather than outline, shapes and surfaces, so I took a picture of a coffee cup on a sunny day and decided to try and make a print from it.

item.title: New Work: “Candlestick Point”
item.description: Candlestick Point: 8" x 10" linocut print, printed on Magnani Pescia A dear friend sent me a photograph she took from Candlestick Point shortly after I made a print of a canal in Amsterdam.

item.title: New Work: “Welcome Home”
item.description: Welcome Home: 5" x 7" two plate linocut print, printed on Rives BFK Richard and I just moved from South Beach back to the area I lived in when I first moved to San Francisco, and we first started dating.

item.title: New Work: Untitled (Bay Bridge)
item.description: Untitled (Bay Bridge): 8" x 10" four plate linocut print, printed on Rives BFK Shortly after I finished “Golden Gate” last year I decided I needed to do a companion piece depicting the other bridge in San Francisco.

item.title: “Golden Gate”, Linocut Print with Watercolor
item.description: Golden Gate: 8" x 10" linocut print with watercolor, printed on Rives BFK In the process of working on Golden Gate last year, I printed the black plate on its own a few times.

item.title: New Work: Days Getting Shorter
item.description: Days Getting Shorter: 8" x 10" Two Plate Linocut, printed on Rives BFK This was a fun piece to work on.
